name: Colorfur
description:
Play as Furama, a colorful cutie that broke out of a tank and help it get out of the lab! But beware! Lab staff prepared some nasty traps for Furama! When it hits a surface that is in a different color than he is, he dies!

Thankfully, Furama has a special ability. Upon dying he gains the color that killed him and can switch between his color and gained color.

How to play:

  • Arrows - Horizontal movement
  • J - Jump
  • K - Change color

A game made for the MadJam #1.

Michal Frostak Hudek, Martin Epa Hajdin, Branislav Quido Kamensky

Credits:

Music - https://freesound.org/people/samueloak89/sounds/404129/
